Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUIView.controllers

Class SetUpController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUIView.controllers.SetUpController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class SetUpController extends Object implements GUIController
This class is the GUIController which handles choosing which host IP and port to connect to.
